testcase.classname: As a user, I want to access the Ticket List through an API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request is sent to the user/ticket/list endpoint with valid authorization information,
testcase.system-out: Given The API user sets "user/ticket/list" path parameters..................passed And The API user saves the response from the user ticket list endpoint with valid authorization information.passed Then The API user verifies that the status code is 200......................passed And The API user verifies that the remark information in the response body is "success".passed
